list-item.p:
M
i : number of primary sampling units (households) in the i th stratum, i = 1, …, 22

S
i : number of primary sampling units (households) selected from the i th stratum, i = 1, …, 22
mi: number of primary sampling units (households) actually enrolled from the i th stratum, i = 1, …, 22

P
i : number of individuals living within the i th stratum, i = 1, …, 22 (census data)

p
i : number of individuals actually enrolled in the i th stratum, i = 1, …, 22
